definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: According to the prosecutor, his greed undermined this artifice.
sentences.chinese: 检察官称，维拉普兰的贪婪让他的伪装泡了汤。

sentences.english: Rovaniemi is located in the Finnish Lapland, the home region of the Santa-Claus.
sentences.chinese: 罗凡尼米位于芬兰拉普兰，是圣诞老人的故乡。

sentences.english: From Lapland to the Azores , the single currency is a reality.
sentences.chinese: 从拉普兰到亚速而岛，统一的货币已经成为了现实。

sentences.english: Villaplane began to realise that Germany may not win the war.
sentences.chinese: 维拉普兰渐渐意识到，德国怕是赢不了战争了。

sentences.english: While I was there in Lapland, it was about 15 degrees during the day.
sentences.chinese: 当我在拉普兰的时候，白天的气温大约是华氏15度。
怎么从赫尔辛基到拉普兰德？

definition: the Sami people, indigenous people in northern Scandinavia

pinyin: Si1 kan1 di4 na4 wei2 ya4

definition: Inuit (politically correct term for Eskimo 愛斯基摩人|爱斯基摩人)

Lake Bled, glacial lake amid the Julian Alps in Slovenia, adjacent to the town of Bled
